EmailTemplate.name: NE London NCS Ambassador back-up training invite
EmailTemplate.subject: Still interested in being an NCS Ambassador?
EmailTemplate.textOnly:
Hi {!Contact.FirstName}!
We're emailing you today as you have previously signed up to become an NCS Ambassador, promoting the programme and sharing your amazing experiences with other young people to help recruit the next generation of NCS graduates!
Our records show that you did not attend the original NCS Ambassador training last October, but don't worry! If you are still interested in becoming an Ambassador, you can attend one of the back-up training sessions that we are running next week. Please see below for details. If you believe you did attend training in October, please confirm this with us by replying to this email.
Training 1 - Waterloo Date: Monday 18th January Time: 17:00 - 19:00 Location: The Challenge, Elizabeth House (Mezz Floor), 39 York Road, London, SE1 7NQ. Sign up here!
OR
Training 2 - Kentish Town Date: Wednesday 20th January Time: 17:00 - 19:00 Location: The Challenge, Courtyard 2, Highgate Studios, 53-79 Highgate Road, London, NW5 1TL Sign up here!
At the training, you will find out more about the role, how to be a great ambassador, and how to start taking part.
We hope to see you there!
The Challenge Society
